metadata.description: Part one of legendary author Noboru Rokuda’s collection of tales of love and war told beneath transcendent skies.Two different tales of love are told beneath the eternal sky in volume one of Sky by Noboru Rokuda. In Return of the Brave, a young woman named Annie is engaged to a brave firefighter, Eddie Rickenbacker, but she needs to gain the approval of her fiancé’s war hero of a father, Robert Rickenbacker, before they can get married. Can she find the courage to rise to the challenge? Orphans’ Toys follows the tale of two childhood friends Albert and Richard who face vastly different realities after enlisting in World War I…
metadata.name: Sky
